name: Candy Foods
overview:
Established in the year 2012, we “Candy Foods Products Pvt. Ltd.” have been engaged in manufacturing, supplying and exporting a premium quality range of Candies. Our variegated range encompasses Strawberry Candy, Orange Candy, Kachcha Mango Candy, Mango Candy and Pineapple Candy.

Our Team: Technicians Engineers Quality Auditors R&D Experts Warehousing & Packaging Experts Skilled Laborers

Our Quality: Since our inception, we have been quality oriented and ensure that all our production and post production processes are in line with the industry standards. Thus, all our quality controllers check all these processes and ensure that only quality products are delivered to the clients.

Our Facilities: With years of experience, we are well aware of the fact that it is essential to have sophisticated facilities to meet the growing demands of our clients. Thus, we have developed a state-of-the-art infrastructure at our premise that spreads across a sprawling area.

Client Satisfaction: We have been able to meet the growing demands of our clients based across the globe with our premium quality range of candies. Our ethical and client-centric business policies enable us to meet the variegated demands of our customers in an effective manner. Skilled professionals at our premise ensure that we offer premium range of products in a timely manner and at cost effective prices.
